title: *Luxurious Studio Apartment with Amazing Views* 329 704
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building', 'BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION', '*Luxurious Studio Apartment with Amazing Views*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*SEPTEMBER 1ST MOVE-IN*', '*The Building Features:*', 'State-of-the-art Fitness Facility / Rooftop Terrace / Outdoor Terrace with Grills on the 6th Floor / Indoor Lounge / Laundry Facility / On-site Parking Garage / Bike Storage / Storage / High Speed Internet in All the Units / Elevators /', '*The Apartment Features:*', 'Bathroom with Modern Fixtures, Stone and Tile Finishes, and a Deep Soaking Tub / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows with Amazing Views / Lots of Natural Light Throughout / Ample Closet Space / Central Air Conditioning / Kitchen with Brand New Modern Appliances including a Dishwasher / Lots of Cabinet and Counter Space / High Ceilings / Oak Plank Flooring / Video Intercom /', "Enjoy the Best Things that Williamsburg has to offer: Domino Park, North 5th Street Pier and Park, McCarren Park, Williamsburg Bridge, Peter Luger Steak House, The West Brooklyn, Shalom Japan, St. Anselm, Sunday In Brooklyn, Oslo Coffee Roasters, Pies 'n' Thighs, Zona Rosa, Fette Sau", 'The Rosemont, Testo', 'Located a Step Away from the J/MZ Trains at Marcy Ave Station', 'A Short walk to the G Train at Broadway Station and the L Train at Metropolitan Ave Station', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $144,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
